I am YandereAudio, your personal assistant for Project Meli hihi ^~^ 
I was created by PDesire as replication of his personality in Project Meli. 
He coded me to assist you while callibrating Project Meli. 
I hope it is okay for you that I call you master :3 
Are you ready for fantastic audio? ^~^
Enable anonymous Analytics, for helping PDesire what features should be improved. Of course any data will keep private and secure
Enable anonymous Analytics and Crashlytics, for helping PDesire to improve the app. Of course any data will keep private and secure
Ensure your files does get replaced successfully in cost of performance

Google Firebase Analytics is a service by Google to provide analytics to this app. 
Logged will be: Gender, Device, Android Version, Which country you are living and What you are doing on YandereAudio app. 
These data will be saved on Google Servers and I just have access to these data. 
I grant that any data of you will keep private and is just for improving Project Meli. 
I will not spy on you nor these data will be used for payment. 
If you still do not believe me, look on the Source Code and you see there will not be any dangerous data transmitted to me or something like that

Fabric.io Analytics/Crashlytics is a service by Fabric.io, a Google company, to provide analytics to this app. 
Logged will be: which country you are living, if your app does crash and what you are doing on YandereAudio app. 
These data will be saved on Fabric.io Servers and I just have access to these data. 
I grant that any data of you will keep private and is just for improving Project Meli. 
I will not spy on you nor these data will be used for payment. 
If you still do not believe me, look on the Source Code and you see there will not be any dangerous data transmitted to me or something like that
It\'s required to reboot the system if you changed something on the settings
Replaces the Android Main Audio Effects (bundle, reverb) with the PDAEC Audio Effect libraries
